<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Usage">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>tab3showVerticalAMetric2Delta</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     var changePerc = api.data.verticalA_headlinemetric2.output.result[0].changeperc;
    if(changePerc>=0){
        api.setState('tab3verticalAMetric2ShowDelta',false);
    }
    else{
        api.setState('tab3verticalAMetric2ShowDelta',true);
    }

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-23 12:28:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>54118a8b7767011061b80bbc3c5a99d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tab3showVerticalAMetric2Delta</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_54118a8b7767011061b80bbc3c5a99d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-23 12:33:37</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>18c25fe5eb10000001</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_54118a8b7767011061b80bbc3c5a99d6</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-01 15:27:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>d3a787561b36351064122144b24bcb5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-01 15:27:56</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
